text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Please stop using “the impeachment” as an excuse for tRump not taking the Coronavirus seriously. He wasn’t worried enough to cancel rallies or play golf. What he was concerned about was what a pandemic would do to the stock market, so he ignored it and hoped it would go away.
